text: Hagi Ra Anumzamo'a huno, Eri'za vaheni'a Jekopuga korora osuo. Na'ankure Nagra kagrane manigahue. Hagi tamavre atrogetama umani'naza kuma tamimpi vahetamina ana maka zamazeri havizahu vagaregahue. Hianagi tamagrira anara osugahue. Hagi Nagra knaza tami'na tamazeri fatgo hugahuanagi avamente knazana tamigahue. Ana nehu'na tamatrenugeta amnea omanigahaze.
